meanings.definition: Up to the point in time that
meanings.sent1: I will wait until you finish your homework.
meanings.sent2: We can't leave until the rain stops.
meanings.sent3: I'll keep dancing until the cows come home!
meanings.sent4: Her patience lasted until the last grain of sand fell.
meanings.sent5: The suspense built until the final moment of the movie.

meanings.sent1: She didn't eat breakfast until noon.
meanings.sent2: They couldn't start the game until everyone arrived.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he wouldn't wake up until pigs fly.
meanings.sent4: The secret was safe until the truth finally came out.
meanings.sent5: The excitement grew until the clock struck midnight.
